name: Lights Out (itch) (dgreenheck)
description:
Game created for N8Jam - "Break the System"

Synopsis

You have become trapped in your own nightmare. Darkness is closing in on you... but there is still hope. With the small light you have remaining, extinguish the dark creatures that have taken your mind captive and save yourself from eternal darkness. Don't get too close, however, or you may begin to feel the darkness getting closer.

Features

  • Use your flashlight to destroy all the monsters and win the game!
  • If you get too close to the monsters, they will steal your light.
  • Find batteries around the world to restore your light
  • Procedurally generated maps - infinite replayability
  • Real-time 2D lighting and shadows
